entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 March 2023
